faq.question: Which formats are included in each plan?
faq.answer: Free & Starter: PDF and plain text. Pro: adds Word and Markdown. Team: all formats including Excel and custom templates.

faq.question: Is formatting preserved in Word export?
faq.answer: Yes! Headings, bullets, bold/italic, and document structure are perfectly preserved in Word format.

faq.question: Can I export multiple summaries at once?
faq.answer: Yes! Pro and Team plans support batch export. Select multiple summaries and export all as one file or individual files.

faq.question: Can I customize the export template?
faq.answer: Team plan includes custom template builder. Set your company's formatting, add logos, headers/footers, and branding.

faq.question: What does Excel export look like?
faq.answer: Structured data with columns: Document Name, Key Point, Category, Page Reference. Perfect for sorting and analyzing.

faq.question: Can I automate exports via API?
faq.answer: Yes! Team plan includes API access. Automatically generate and export summaries programmatically.
